website_summaries.verdict: A light, effective cleanser that works well for most consumers. We love the consistency and formula, but wish the tube had a sturdier, more secure cap.
pros: Does a good job cleansing skin and removing makeup without stripping natural oils
Great for all skin types, including sensitive
Skin feels clean after using it
cons: Very rarely, it may cause breakouts
Subpar packaging is prone to leaking

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this cleanser from Sephora and loved it. I purchased it for the second time on Amazon and what I received was not what was pictured. As you can see from my photos, the black decorative print and the "No. 9" are both missing. The "cap" is awful. You have to twist it and squeeze the product out. After twisting it back to close it, additional product comes out - giving me more than I actually need and preventing me from standing it right side up because the product gets all over the counter. I'm not sure if this is just a very old product/packaging or if it is completely fake.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Not the product I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this seller is not actually selling the advertised product. I ordered the Beste No 9 jelly cleanser and instead received the original Beste Jelly Cleanser. There are formulation differences. Extremely disappointing and will be returning. Just advertise exactly what you’re selling!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley MacLearn

customer_reviews.title: Product sent was not same product pictured and described!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was the old formula. It was not the Beste No.9 as described and pictured. Very disappointed. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Recieved the old "beste" cleanser istead of the "beste No ...
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the old "beste" cleanser istead of the "beste No. 9" the old product has a higher pH and a cap that leaks, will be returning
customer_reviews.author: karen shepard

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser, Gentle Yet Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to Drunk Elephant products and tried this out for the first time a few months back. I really like how this lathers slightly and gives my combination skin a very thorough cleansing without stripping out the natural oils of the skin. It's gentle but also effective to remove traces of makeup. My husband who has rosacea also uses this and loves it. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: My skin has never felt better!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, I was terrified of starting the face-washing process since I've heard horror stories from friends: they started washing their faces and got worse acne than ever, accompanied by pain and rashes and red splotches... but they must not have known about this cleanser, because my face has NEVER FELT BETTER! I will never go back, I love this cleanser SO MUCH. It starts off as a gel but quickly suds up with a touch of water -- the result is that you barely need any at all to get a great clean. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Martins

customer_reviews.title: I'm using this as my water based cleanser for double ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as my water based cleanser for double cleansing. My face is so smooth and clean once i'm done. I can see a huge difference when I use this vs. my Micellar water cleanser. It seems to make my face a little sensitive if I don't moisturize right away, but I should be doing that anyway. Will continue to use for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Received correct cleanser as advertised and i love it!
customer_reviews.text: Despite what all the negative reviews say, i purchased the Jelly Cleanser and received the exact “Beste No. 9” version as advertised. I love it, it’s the same bottle I’ve purchased elsewhere and has the updated non-leaking cap.
customer_reviews.author: missaliisa

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for only a week and a few days but loving this cleanser. Love the jelly consistency, and that a little goes a lot way!! It makes my skin SO soft. And on top of it all gets my makeup off really well. All I can ask for in a cleanser 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a change right away
customer_reviews.text: With this face wash, I noticed a change in my skin's quality immediately - it was brighter, shinier (in a good way) and overall looked healthier. Only issue is that I did experience some breakouts when I first switched - that could be due to changing products cold turkey. I am now using this face wash 4 days a week and my other 3 days a week which seems to be a perfect balance. I am excited to try more drunk elephant products!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this gel for months to wash my face in the shower. Don’t be afraid of the cost — a pea-sized drop is all you need for your face, neck, and ears. It leaves my face feeling very clean and soft, with no dryness. I like it much better than soap, and it washes off with no soap residue. Being a guy, I don’t wear makeup. Yet... But I’m all ready to be on any TV show!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Best Clean Beauty Face Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I am SUPER impressed with this Clean Beauty Face cleanser and the best part it takes off even the waterproof makeup! I am PRO makeup artist and it is my Go-To cleanser at night and makeup remover:) I wear pro makeup every day and this made my daily beauty routine way better and cleaner:) Sofia Bee (@Beautybysofiabee)
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Bee

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample size from Sephora a while back and absolutely loved what it did to my skin. I needed some face wash and have been trying to use some more natural items in general so I caved and bought this. I love it. The scent isn't too strong and it gets super foamy; along with my face scrubber, my face feels so much cleaner and I have noticed a difference with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hornbacher

customer_reviews.title: squeaky clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash! It is light and works well. Does not dry out my skin and I feel as though I am "clean" when I rinse it off my face. A little bit goes a long way, which is great because my stepdaughter keeps stealing it from me! Recommend this product to those who have sensitive skin and perfume allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: My skin loves this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I was given a free sample of this and packed it for a trip because of the small size. After one week, I noticed the difference. So I am hooked. So far all the drunk elephant products have been really nice for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cookin' in Houston

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Well first I want to say it just got here. I will be updating my review in about two weeks. I bough the small size one to see how my skin would react. I have had really bad acne for the past couple months and in just 3 weeks my skin has recovered. I know this is a make up remover but, this cleans your skin completely. I will be inserting a couple pictures I took. The bottle looks a bit dirty but giving it the benefit of the doubt... it look as if it has some ink from the inside box. It smells just like the other one I owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Cleanser for Dry Sensitive Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry, sensitive, acne prone skin. Typically facial products either dry out my skin too much or aren’t effective in removing dirt. I’ve been using the product for less than a week and have noticed significant healing and reduction of acne prone areas. Will add before and after photos after 2 weeks of use. For reference I have tried Shisheidos Ibuki cleanser, Burts Bees Argan Oil Cleanser, First Aid Beauty Cleanser, Indie Lee’s Cleanser, Cerave Face Cleanser, none of it worked.
customer_reviews.author: CaliKelsey

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It’s less harsh than some cleansers, and it doesn’t bother my sensitive skin, but it WORKS to cleanse out my pores
customer_reviews.author: Damon Odell Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay. I was expecting a lot more for the price. It feels great while cleansing, and made my face feel soft after. However, it didn't really help my complexion or acne. It didn't cause any breakouts, but it didn't prevent any either. I broke out a lot more with this product than with other products that i have used. I didn't even finish this product, before I switched to something that worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Montoya

customer_reviews.title: EVERY MORNING ROUTINE
customer_reviews.text: `I work in a casino so the smoke build up is disgusting because i'm not a smoker. However, i feel so refreshed after getting home and adding this to my morning shower before bedtime. Its the BEST FACE WASH and affordable too.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Smith

customer_reviews.title: SKIN REACTION
customer_reviews.text: I had stopped using this product because I had skin reactions where my eye lids got puffy & I got red patches on my face. I wasn’t sure what was causing it, but now I can confirm it was this product because after months of not using it, I finally used it again last night & woke up this morning with my eyelids puffed up & red. I feel a burning sensation on my eyelids. I’m never buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cleanser
customer_reviews.text: as someone who breaks out all the time & has SUPER sensitive skin, this is a lifesaver! There’s no scent & definitely doesn’t irritate my skin. I can not recommend drunk elephant enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Sad sad sad
customer_reviews.text: *deep sigh* it’s with my sincerest condolences I write to you all today to inform you that this product never made it to my face. The Product had already been opened (Potentially used) so for sanitary reasons I did not use. It was a waste of coins.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Drunk Elephant Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser is by far one of the best cleansing products I've ever used, and I've used plenty. It thoroughly removes makeup, mascara, and does a fantastic job at cleansing pores. It doesn't take much for one face wash...a little goes a long way. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin & deep cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! Initially discovered it through a sample but have grown to love it. This cleanser is perfect for sensitive skin but it still.gets the job done for a thorough cleaning. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Flb

customer_reviews.title: Best Facewash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every night for a few months now. I have eczema and this leaves my face clean and refreshed. Rare is the need to also use a face wipe to take off all of my makeup - this does the job fully! Totally worth the money for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laneez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Love how clean my skin is after using this but the packaging is a disaster. Even when you lock it, it still allows the product to leak out. Either store it upside down or lose a very expensive product from crappy packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Will order again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash! It doesn't leave my face dried out like other cleansers. I have always been prone to breakouts during that time of the month, but they are significantly less since using Drunk Elephant. This will be a regular product in my face washing routine.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Truly cleanses skin
customer_reviews.text: Great cleanser, but do use carefully as it may dry out sensitive or combination Skin. In my opinion it’s probably best for oily skin or for use during summer or warmer months.
customer_reviews.author: MariaG

customer_reviews.title: Best facial and body wash
customer_reviews.text: One of the few facial cleaners that doesn’t give me a rash; I use it as a general body wash too but wish it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Best skincare ever
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have tried so many product lines. This one really works. It is costly but I am worth the investment. This is my go to product line. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Marek

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and non drying
customer_reviews.text: It’s cleanser so it can only be so moisturizing but it’s gentle and the smell is pleasant. It could have a sweeter smell. But given how gentle it is, it makes sense why the smell is light.
customer_reviews.author: Sidra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great cleansers
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample at Sephora it’s really nice not drying at all but also not too oily great for sensitive combo skin
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wright

customer_reviews.title: Now my #1 cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleanser I’ve tried in a while! It’s very gentile though so I would pear it with a light exfoliant of some kind, but overall the quality is amazing. Kinda smells like baby powder tho.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: really works well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her acne, she definitely had improvement after a few times of use. Was a bit pricey but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: annmarie appel

customer_reviews.title: Drunk Elephant is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love love this cleanser. It has really helped with my adult acne
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Great product if used religiously!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey compared to some, but well worth the investment if you're ready to adult about skin care and anti aging. Works best with their other host of products to supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Bahahahah

customer_reviews.title: A lot of money to pay for a sample
customer_reviews.text: I loved the stuff, but too much money for such a little sample!
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Dirty? Used?
customer_reviews.text: It works fine I’ve bought this before through Sephora but I decided to buy through amazon due today and when I opened it was dirty? I don’t understand why it would be used/dirty

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting gentle cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder this. My last bottle lasted 6 months! So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF SLAPS
customer_reviews.text: Product is my all time favorite. I got a little bottle to try from Sephora and after using it for a few days it really helped my skin. Ignore all the bad bs reviews on this product, like oOh the packaging is old or whatever (poor you)... seriously... this stuff is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: This is my Favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: I use this wash to gently remove all of my makeup and clean my face. I love this wash bc it is gentle, doesn’t dry out my face and leaves me with a clean canvas for applying moisturizer and night cream.
customer_reviews.author: jocelyne f.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Great cleanser!! Cleans skin and removes makeup without over drying.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Really just didn't love it. The smell was off-putting to me
customer_reviews.text: Really just didn't love it. The smell was off-putting to me, like play dough. I use all natural skincare now and this was just not right for me. I also found it extremely drying on my skin personally. Just wasn't for me, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face soap!
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday face wash. Strong but gentle I love it. Due to the pandemic, Sephora is closed. I was so happy to see Amazon had it. Fast delivery. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: deserae

customer_reviews.title: Combination skin
customer_reviews.text: It's the only face cleanser I've used that removes ALL my makeup without needing another product afterwards. Left my skin feeling smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Solomon Bourbeau

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash, along with the 4 morning and night serums. I was in between products that were fine, but not exactly what I wanted...and then I tried Drunk Elephant! It worked quickly, and has continued to work. It's a little pricey, but the travel kit lasted for 3 months, so I can only assume the full sizes products will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HU

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Not for acne prone skin. I was breaking out and thought something more gentle would be better. This barely cleaned my face. Didn't get makeup off. Couldn't get it to lather with sunscreen on my face. Bottle leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Shebee

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but I will probably use this for ever. I love they way it works with other products. It doesn’t leave your face too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: There are better jelly cleansers
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not good and it does not lather well. Previously used Belif and it not only smelled better, but was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: grahamad42

customer_reviews.title: Adult cleanser for adults
customer_reviews.text: I like this I got is based on YouTube reviews because my old cleanser was to aggressive. I woke up glowy and nice. It feels very gental but affective. Most expensive cleanser I've ever gotten but seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rich

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with break outs due to my combination skin but after using this product my face is clearer than it has been in years! Absolutely love this product it has not over dried my face either. And the whole drunk elephant name is kinda fun:)
customer_reviews.author: Justina Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. But the price is a bit high
customer_reviews.author: Nik  R

customer_reviews.title: Love drunk elephant
customer_reviews.text: Love the whole product line. Has for sure helped my middle age acne prone skin and this is the base of the whole line. If you have tried a million products and at best they don’t make your skin worse, then drink elephant may be for you as this is the first line I have used that has made a positive difference!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for not for me
customer_reviews.text: I live in Colorado and my skin is very dry and sensitive. After a fee uses, It did peel my skin and made it very dry, but again just my skin type and where I live, since it's super dry. I use many of their products and I love them all! this cleanser just wan't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my face of everything without leaving it dry and stripped.
customer_reviews.author: traci h

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Simple and clean. Helps remove all my glitter and Alyssa Edwards eyes shadow. I really like the small list of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Favorite water-based cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years!! Great water-based cleanser for AM or PM use, very gentle on the skin. Always ordered the 1 oz. bottle in the past but I’m so happy with the 5 oz., more product for longer!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price. I love Drunk Elephant products!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite face wash, takes off make up but is gentle and is a must if you’re using the drunk elephant line. A little goes a long way and last for a much longer time than my previous face washes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystallee

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle. A little goes a long way. This line is wonderful for my skin
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Favorite facial cleanser and makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cleanser, I use it like twice a day and it’s amazing at removing my makeup. It also helps wash away oiliness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff. Takes off mascara easily and leaves skin feeling very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Savage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product. She also loves the cream!
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily/combination skin this cleanser was a game changer for me. I love the clear jelly texture, the scent is light but refreshing. Absolutely love love it! I was previously using acne free and it stripped my skin, leaving it feeling dried out and right after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Shae Cates

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing facial cleanser! Good quality for a good price! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bruscino

customer_reviews.title: Love it! :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I swear this helped clean my skin I heard jelly cleansers are good for people with oily skin and it helps so much. It takes off all my make up and leaves my skin feeling so fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my sensitive skin. Product lasts a long time because you only need to use a small dab. I never broke out or had any irritation using Drunk Elephant cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great cleanser leaves you nice and clean without over stripping your skin it lathers nicely and leaves your skin feeling renewed after using
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner on the market in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Best facial cleanser I’ve ever used. It leaves zero traces of makeup or reside and cleans without drying.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Drying
customer_reviews.text: Love all drunk elephant products! Literally life changing. This jelly cleanser takes off all my make up and I feel so clean. May be a little drying so be sure to moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Baddley

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love
customer_reviews.text: I think this formula is different?! Not the same as the sample I got at Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Middleton

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy this again and won’t recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I need in a face wash is one that can remove all traces of makeup from the day and this face wash doesn’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Glazier

customer_reviews.title: Execellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample from Sephora and absolutely loved it! I also received a sample of the moisturizer that I will soon purchase once I run out. My skin is incredibly soft and it is not harsh on my rosacea skin.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Galjour

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This product removes dirt and makeup completely and is all I need to use anymore. No more eye remover or cleansing pads! I only use at night.
customer_reviews.author: A. Neves

customer_reviews.title: Good for makeup removal.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product. It's very good for makeup removal. Leaves face cool. It's expensive but worth it. It's my go to make up removal face wash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bowen- Mcinnis

customer_reviews.title: Removes makeup well, but face feels dry
customer_reviews.text: This product removes mascara well and cleans your face but I noticed that my skin feels more dried out after using it. It feels like i have to use extra moisturizers after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Drunk Elephant!
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser I've used on my sever cystic acne by far. The drunk elephant skin care line saved my skin 😭
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This was not the No.9 Beste Cleanser. Wrong packaging and no ingredient list.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Arnott

customer_reviews.title: My my skin breakout.
customer_reviews.text: This product made my face breakout! Haven’t had issues with my skin for 5 years now and once I started using this my skin immediately started getting angry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, my face feels so soft and clean after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Has a great smell and foams easily. It does the job as described and removes my makeup easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Five stars the best
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all Drunk Elephant products I just received plus did Aztec before: I recommend all
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not product that’s advertised
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate product description. Old cleanser not the No 9 as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Emily Barletto

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love Drunk Elephant products and was so happy to find them available on Amazon. My order arrived right on schedule with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Removes makeup so easily, no scent, and helps keep my skin clear
customer_reviews.author: Leah Scott

customer_reviews.title: love this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love that this cleanser moisturizes and regulates by combo skin! I never feel too oily or too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: doesn’t have a strong smell. great cleanser for oily skin
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: it's not working for my super reactive skin as my face turns red at the ...
customer_reviews.text: The jelly consistency slides out of your hands before you ever get it to lather. Unfortunately, it's not working for my super reactive skin as my face turns red at the cheeks and forehead which is very noticeable after finding the product off. It does appear to remove the makeup....if you can manage to get and keep the product on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! It super light weight, easy to apply and a very neutral cleanser. I have super sensitive skin so when it comes to a cleanser I need something neutral and this is definitely it. You get a large bottle for 30 dollars and it will last you a couple of months and I wash my face day and night. Don’t hesitate get this stuff it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherly Morales

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without drying
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really cleans my face even when I wear makeup without extra scrubbing or extra makeup removing products. And it doesn't dry my face out even though it cleans it so well.
customer_reviews.author: mrsmarple

customer_reviews.title: Great for Makeup Removal & Clean skin!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this face wash and I have noticed significant improvement in her skin as she is a teenager with acne prone skin. She loves to wear makeup and it also melts away the products easily.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: awesome for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Have fallen in love with this product. Works for both mine and my teenagers sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Drying and soapy
customer_reviews.text: I find this product to be extremely drying and the scent to be very soapy smelling. I don’t know why it has such high reviews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great face wash
customer_reviews.text: has very clean ingredients and does not dry my face after use. great for my sensitive skin. and able to use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: kpy product reviews

customer_reviews.title: New packaging sucks
customer_reviews.text: The new twist bottle cap is terrible, the product leaks out constantly and I’ve wasted a quarter of the bottle already. The formula also seems to be more aggressive, it’s leaving my oily skin dry and flakey. I’d been using this cleanser for months but this is the last bottle I’ll ever purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful face wash
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful face wash. It cleans my face without drying my skin. It removes all makeup residue while still being gentle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CO Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Drunk Elephant does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I love anything Drunk Elephant! It’s fragrance free and works great with my exfoliating brush. Makes my skin feel so clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela M Cusack

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser. Works so well for makeup removal. Have used many cleansers over the years this is the best so far.

customer_reviews.author: Cj

product_meta.title: Drunk Elephant Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser - Gentle Face Wash and Makeup Remover for All Skin Types - 150 Milliliters/ 5 Ounces
product_meta.description:
Size:5 Fl OzTHE DRUNK ELEPHANT DIFFERENCE
With a mission to deliver clinically-effective, clean skincare products formulated with both cutting-edge synthetic and natural ingredients, Drunk Elephant knows that every ingredient should directly benefit the health of your skin or the safety of the formulation. 

 BESTE No. 9 JELLY CLEANSER
Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser has a unique blend of mild surfactants and makeup dissolving emollients, with a gentle formula that rinses away without an ounce of residue, leaving skin clean and soft. 

 NO FRAGRANCE
After carefully balancing the best ingredients available, Drunk Elephant doesnt have to add anything to mask their natural scents. When you smell their products, you will likely detect nothing but a glycerin base with slight hints of Marula oil, Zinc Oxide, Thermal Mud, Fruit Enzymes, and Vitamins for a refreshing and reassuring scent. 

 BREAK THE CYCLE
Your skin is left vulnerable with the overuse of harsh exfoliates, chemical peels, expensive laser treatments, Botox abuse, layered foundations and powders, and chemically-laden beauty creams. Theres nothing wrong with an occasional beneficial beauty splurge here and there (when appropriate), but it can be a vicious cycle that is hard to stop. 

 COMMITTED TO CLEAN
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only clean ingredients that either directly benefit the skins health, or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulas. Youll never find the Suspicious 6 (Essential Oils, Drying Alcohols, Silicones, Chemical Screens, Fragrances/Dyes and SLS) in their products.
feature_bullets: BESTE No. 9 JELLY CLEANSER. An innovative jelly cleanser that removes all traces of makeup and grime. Free of SLS, fragrance and essential oils, Beste is totally non-irritating, non-sensitizing and appropriate for every skin type

BALANCED, HEALTHY SKIN. Beste has a pH of 6.1, which is what powers the stacked mild cleansing ingredients and helps keep the natural barrier of skin balanced and healthy. This cruelty-free product is vegan and gluten-free

NO QUESTION IN QUALITY. A routine is only as good as its worst product, and a product is only as good as its worst ingredient. Drunk Elephant is dedicated to your internal health and external skin health; "If there's any DOUBT, it's OUT.

SENSITIVE VS. SENSITIZED. When skin is exposed to irritants and sensitizers, damage can be imperceptible and cumulative, leaving it in a reactive mode. "Sensitive" skin is often just skin that has become sensitized over time by harsh additives

MADE IN THE USA. Drunk Elephant doesnt take shortcuts or compromise ingredients to save money. They are hands-on and will stay true to their ethos. Their products are designed, tested and made in the United States. Drunk Elephant is certified cruelty-free, they have never, nor will ever, animal test or allow products to be tested on animals.
